Author: Arroya-
Text: Lmao “‘I get dehydrated in my sleep” SAME  I loled bc I feel like that’s soooo ed culture.   Like does anyone else drink a liter of water after they wake up???    Do normal ppl drink a liter of water after waking up? Lately I make it hot so it warms me up

Author: slapmyalpaca
Text: Ugh I hate this feeling! I constantly get worried about drinking water at night because the number in the morning will be higher so I just let myself be thirsty, it’s stupid and horrible but I can’t help it :((( so this is totally relateable haha
